title: The Bloodline (The Friessens Book 2)
features: Wow....Wow!!! A Must ReadI love the Friessen men! They are strong, hunky, and love their women. In spite of their tendency to treat their women with kid gloves, they are endearing. Andy's story took me by surprise… —Susie Reviewer“Blood not always thicker than water. This was such a heart-wrenching story. Skeletons come out of the closet in an unexpected way.” —BG
Andy Friessen has two guarantees in life:

1. His wife, Laura, and his children are safe from the control of his family.2. A safety deposit box holds evidence that could blow his mother’s world apart.But nothing is ever simple or easy, and one night tragedy strikes, yanking the rug from under him. This time, secrets and lies could destroy the solid foundation he’s built for his family.
description: Review
Praise for The Bloodline
"Who wouldn't want a man like Andy!" Kindle Customer
"Andy's story took me by surprise."
"This book says so much more than just the words. It will make you think about what's really important in life." Lora
Praise for Lorhainne Eckhart
"Lorhainne Eckhart has a way at really tugging on the heartstrings and this story is no exception." Love's Reading
"Eckhart is one of the best storytellers that I have read in a long time." Nook Reviewer
"Wow...Wow!! A must read." Susie
"Grabbed me from the start and held me the whole way through." Kindle Reviewer
"I am passionate about Lorhainne Eckhart's writing." Kindle Reviewer
"A brilliant book." Kindle Reviewer
"I love Lorhainne Eckhart's books." Kindle Reviewer
"One of my favorite authors I cannot put her books down. The characters are so real." Lorrie
"The family history is so intense it is hard to stop until the end." Ana"Best family series ever." Kindle Reviewer
"I love the dynamics of this powerful close family." Kindle Reviewer"Get it, read it, fall in love with this series and this author." Kindle Customer

"You hooked me." Karen"She understands the power of influential people, position and wealth as well as the little people." Kindle Reviewer"A very good collection of stories surrounding the large Friessen family." Kindle Customer
"This is a series you will go back to time and again to re-read." Kindle Reviewer"Ms. Eckhart's books are so filled with raw emotion and family relationships and all those dynamics." Kindle Reviewer
From the Inside Flap

"It tugged at her heart, watching her big strong alpha male and the love he had for his children, so involved with them. He was so good with them, and they worshipped the ground he walked on. Her children would never know her worry. How could they, having a father like Andy?"
About the Author

New York Times & USA Today bestseller Lorhainne Eckhart writes Raw Relatable Real Romance is best known for her big family romances series, where Morals and family are running themes. Danger, romance, and a drive to do what is right will see you glued to the page. As one fan calls her, she is the Queen of the family saga. (aherman) writing the ups and downs of what goes on within a family but also with some suspense, angst and of course a bit of romance thrown in for good measure. Follow Lorhainne on Bookbub to receive alerts on New Releases and Sales and join her mailing list at LorhainneEckhart.com for her Monday Blog, books news, giveaways and FREE reads. With over 120 books, audiobooks, and multiple series published and available at all retailers now translated into six languages. She is a multiple recipient of the Readers' Favorite Award for Suspense and Romance, and lives in the Pacific Northwest on an island, is the mother of three, her oldest has autism and she is an advocate for never giving up on your dreams.

Each and every book has totally different genres of stories but the one thing in common is how she is able to wrap it around the family which is the heart of each story.” (C. Logue)', 'The Friessens: An emotional big family romance series, the Friessen family siblings find their relationships tested, lay their hearts on the line, and discover lasting love! “Lorhainne Eckhart is one of my go to authors when I want a guaranteed good book. So many twists and turns, but also so much love and such a strong sense of family.” (Lora W., Reviewer)', 'The Parker Sisters: The Parker Sisters are a close-knit family, and like any other family they have their ups and downs. “Eckhart has crafted another intense family drama…The character development is outstanding, and the emotional investment is high…" (Aherman, Reviewer)', 'The McCabe Brothers: Join the five McCabe siblings on their journeys to the dark and dangerous side of love! An intense, exhilarating collection of romantic thrillers you won’t want to miss. — “Eckhart has a new series that is definitely worth the read. The queen of the family saga started this series with a spin-off of her wildly successful Friessen series.” From a Readers’ Favorite award—winning author and “queen of the family saga” (Aherman)']}
